sense.gloss: should (be), bound (to be), expected (to be), must (be)
wooden frame on the tip of the mast of a Japanese ship that prevents the hawser from falling out
forked tool used for hanging scrolls
pushing up with hands under opponent's armpits, armpit push
it cannot be that..., it is highly unlikely that..., it is impossible that...
hemp rope fastened from the bow of a Japanese ship to the tip of the mast
only natural, no wonder, as expected, of course, as it should be
cannot (do), it is impossible that..., it is (highly) unlikely that...
it cannot be that..., it is highly unlikely that..., it is impossible that...
x: はずが無い・はずがない

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑十分↑↓じゅうぶん↓↑年↑↓ねん↓をとっているから、その↑理由↑↓りゆう↓が↑分↑↓わ↓からない↑筈↑↓はず↓がない。
sdata.e: You are too old not to see the reason.

sdata.j: ↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓の↑筈↑↓はず↓がない。
↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓の↑筈↑↓はず↓がない。
あなたはそのような↑馬鹿↑↓ばか↓なことはしない↑筈↑↓はず↓だ。
sdata.e: You ought to know better than to do such a thing.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑来週↑↓らいしゅう↓ニューヨークに↑行↑↓い↓く↑筈↑↓はず↓になっている。
sdata.e: I'm supposed to go to New York next week.

sdata.j: ↑話↑↓はなし↓を↑聞↑↓き↓いたのだから↑興味↑↓きょうみ↓がある↑筈↑↓はず↓だ。
sdata.e: He listened to my pitch, so he must be interested.

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いち↓↑円↑↓えん↓↑盗↑↓ぬす↓んで↑見↑↓み↓に↑行↑↓い↓く↑決心↑↓けっしん↓をしたが、↑貧乏↑↓びんぼう↓の↑家↑↓いえ↓に↑盗↑↓ぬす↓める↑一↑↓いち↓↑円↑↓えん↓なんぞ↑有↑↓あ↓ろう↑筈↑↓はず↓がない。
sdata.e: I had resolved to steal one yen to go see it, but we were poor and there was no way I would find one yen to steal around our house.

sdata.j: ↑土曜↑↓どよう↓の↑晩↑↓ばん↓には、パリから、↑一↑↓いち↓↑晩↑↓ばん↓↑泊↑↓とま↓りで↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓の↑夫↑↓おっと↓が↑来↑↓く↓る↑筈↑↓はず↓になつてゐるのです。
sdata.e: Her husband was supposed to come visit her from Paris for a single night Saturday night.

sdata.j: ↑土曜↑↓どよう↓の↑晩↑↓ばん↓には、パリから、↑一↑↓いち↓↑晩↑↓ばん↓↑泊↑↓とま↓りで↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓の↑夫↑↓おっと↓が↑来↑↓く↓る↑筈↑↓はず↓になっているのです。
sdata.e: Her husband was supposed to come visit her from Paris for a single night Saturday night.
